quotes.quote: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.
Style is something each of us already has, all we need to do is find it.
In difficult times, fashion is always outrageous.
When a woman says, 'I have nothing to wear!' what she really means is, 'There's nothing here for who I'm supposed to be today.
There is a lot of noise out there. I don't want to follow the trend - I want to create the trend.
Don't be into trends. Don't make fashion own you, but you decide what you are, what you want to express by the way you dress and the way to live.
Never let a trend get in the way of creating a great outfit for yourself.
Style is a simple way of saying complicated things.
Trendy is the last stage before tacky.
Don't follow a trend. Follow your heart.
If you follow the trend, you'll always be right behind it.
We trendsetters, not trend sweaters.

Socrates became a trendsetter. Other philosophers, including Plato and Aristotle and Gus, quickly followed suit, dropping their last names too. And, for centuries after that there would be countless imitators including oltaire, Michelangelo, and, much later, Cher.
It's always about timing. If it's too soon, no one understands. If it's too late, everyone's forgotten.
If you are not a trend setter, at least be able to exploit the ones you see.
I don't do fashion. I am fashion.
You gotta give everybody a new trend a new wave, something new to do.
Fashion is about dressing according to what's fashionable. Style is more about being yourself.
I have a trend of my own.
The real trendsetters are the ones who rebel. Those are the ones who everyone in fashion eventually follows.
Anyone can get dressed up and glamorous, but it is how people dress in their days off that are the most intriguing.
You dont have to follow trends, you should set them, because there are too many 'her's and 'him's but there is only one 'you'.
Fashion you can buy, but style you possess. The key to style is learning who you are, which takes years. There's no how-to road map to style. It's about self expression and, above all, attitude.
Great things are not accomplished by those who yield to trends and fads and popular opinion.
Clothes mean nothing until someone lives in them.
Any fool can do something cool and look cool, but it takes skill to make something uncool cool again.
